bibl.title: Lagus and Arsinoe: An Exploration of Legendary Royal Bastardy.
bibl.note: Analyzes the activities of non-elite tenants described in Apion estate accounts, in part. P. Oxy. LV, 3804 (566 CE). - Tenants, Partnerships, and Estates. - Pekusios and Loukiou. - Pekusios in Context. - Estates in Mobility. - Conclusions - Evaluating the Strategy of Pekusios and Company. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Philip F. Venticinque, Risk Management: Social Capital and Economic Strategies on Late Roman Estates in Oxyrhynchus.

Analyzes the activities of non-elite tenants described in Apion estate accounts, in part. P. Oxy. LV, 3804 (566 CE). - Tenants, Partnerships, and Estates. - Pekusios and Loukiou. - Pekusios in Context. - Estates in Mobility. - Conclusions - Evaluating the Strategy of Pekusios and Company. - Avec résumé en anglais.
